column1: ...It was of smooth metal with no markings of age. It was in the shape of an elongated canopied orb, completely unadorned...
A statue of a dear dark bird, words etched to its base
A worn copy of the seventh Viergic Psalterium Superstitiosi
And in my arms he played / and in my arms he played
Slowly mouthing G-I-O-H she blocked the entire corridor

...comes with an extensive vocabulary of tetrapartite commands and a capacity to listen for your wishes anywhere in its confines. You may for instance call the name of our fragrant flowers, the Ryyb, to request for refreshment which it will then prepare with a view to its knowledge of...
